source.2f1c9b64:
# Pandas Exercise 

In this exercise we will be using the [SF Salaries Dataset](https://www.kaggle.com/kaggle/sf-salaries) from Kaggle! Just follow along and complete the tasks outlined in bold below.
source.3a587482: ** What is the name of lowest paid person (including benefits)? Do you notice something strange about how much he or she is paid?**
source.12a194a7: ** Read Salaries.csv as a dataframe called sal.**
source.f21f1dfa: ** What is the name of highest paid person (including benefits)?**
source.18ee81d1: ** What is the job title of  JOSEPH DRISCOLL ? Note: Use all caps, otherwise you may get an answer that doesn't match up (there is also a lowercase Joseph Driscoll). **
source.3532b7d8: ** How many unique job titles are there? **
